### IPromptPlusConfig.FolderLog property
</br>


#### Gets or sets the folder path where log files will be stored.

```csharp
public string FolderLog { get; set; }
```

### Property Value

A string representing the path to the log folder. If not set or empty, the folder is set to UserProfile.
